ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.NAME: Name:
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_1: I am Iheb Mekni, a dedicated and skilled Full Stack Developer based in Tunis, Tunisia. I specialize in designing and developing robust microservices architectures, leveraging my expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Systems Engineering from the Faculty of Sciences in Bizerte. Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work with leading technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, and Angular.
ABOUT.ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_2: At Xtensus and IDNTT, I played key roles in migrating monolithic applications to scalable microservices, ensuring secure authentication with Keycloak, and maintaining detailed API documentation. My passion for software development drives me to continuously learn and innovate, striving to deliver high-quality, efficient, and scalable solutions. I take pride in my meticulous approach to problem-solving and my ability to adapt to new challenges.
